sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_login_history (emp_seq, login_date, access_ip, device_type) VALUES (#loginId#, NOW(3), #loginIp#, #loginMthd#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT emp_seq as loginId , DATE_FORMAT(login_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS creatDt , access_ip as loginIp , device_type as loginMthd FROM $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_login_history WHERE emp_seq = #loginId# AND device_type = 'WEB_LOGIN' ORDER BY login_date DESC LIMIT 1,1

SELECT a.LOG_ID , a.CREAT_DT , a.CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM FROM $DB_NEOS$COMTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN $DB_NEOS$COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.LOG_ID = #logId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.LOG_ID , a.CREAT_DT , DECODE(a.CONECT_MTHD,'LOGI','로그인','LOGO','로그아웃',a.CONECT_MTHD) CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM , b.USER_ID AS USER_ID FROM $DB_NEOS$COMTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN $DB_NEOS$COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
a.CONECT_MTHD LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
b.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #loginNm# || '%'
TO_CHAR(a.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
ORDER BY a.CREAT_DT DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.LOG_ID) as cnt FROM $DB_NEOS$COMTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN $DB_NEOS$COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
a.CONECT_MTHD LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
b.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #loginNm# || '%'
TO_CHAR(a.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
